やっぱり楽しいCS:S
One of the best first person shooters ever! Simple deathmatch style gameplay with a variety of weapons and game modes. Great for mindless fun!
Buy this game ! You may not play it all the time  but you will play it till the end of days.

The best free game ever (I got it for free with HL2). 

With CS, it is your skill against another's. No perks. No special guns provided as a reward for hours of gameplay. No rewards for killstreaks. 

The core maps are superbly balanced, yet community maps add endless variety. 

No other game comes close for team based play.  Playing 5 v 5 with a great team against a great team is one of my all time gaming pleasures. 

Steam was the first to get 'friends' lists right, and CS was the first game to get voice chat right. It is so easy to drop into a game with your friends, and so easy to make friends in game. The game can be very social if you find the right servers.

If you are in any doubt about how much I love CS, look at the amount of hours I sunk into it. Then consider that gameplay data wasn't recorded until a few years after the game was originally release. I couldn't tell you how much I played in those first few years. 

That's also the one potential negative to the game, of course - it can become a timesink if you let it.
Just one of the best games you can get to play online. Loads of mods, good community, as well as actual skill needed to play, none of that newer game bullcrap.
A must have!

Well, what can I say? - This game has been up for a long time, and there is no ending, that's for sure!

However, this game lost many regular players by upgrading it into Orange Box -engine. New features got many players pissed off and they quitted the game.
Somehow, there is still enough people to play with, and it's still fun, even that the game now requires a bit better computer to run it without lagging & such stuff.

Game WAS better indeed, but they've made their choise to upgrade it, and they've already done it, so there is no choise but face the changes made!
Always being better and better!

If you played Counter-strike for Half-life 1. You'll surely like this, because, it has great graphics, gameplay, brings back memories, and plus you won't have to worry about forgetting to get ammo from the shop, because, the shop does all the ammo shopping for you. And it's cheap. If you want to play with me on this game, send me an invite, and maybe I'll play. That's it for my recommendation, have fun fragging. Oh and please don't be a jerk and listen to one of your commanders, because, not cooperating can get you killed in the first place. Sheesh.

A classic FPS which any Steam gamer should own. The vast amount of mods and other custom content gives this game a huge amount of replayabilty. Despite it's age it still remains one of the most popular Steam games. From Climbing complex maps to fleeing a growing Zombie horde and surfing down maps, you'll discover a plethora of different interesting games within CS:S.

This game is practically a fixture on steam, everyone just about has it and there are few people who haven't heard of it on here.  For those who have steam and haven't ever heard of CS:S err the one random person probably in this world lol ... it is a FPS where two teams the CT and T's fight to win rounds.  Insanely simple concept and normally on most maps a quick start fighting game ... no real storyline but there doesn’t really have to be.  The game is quite cheap at the moment anyway and all in all a good multiplayer team/clan shooter.  The maps vary and due to the amount of time it's been around there are many plug-ins’ and mods for this game but normally the basic "shoot and kill" is still the main objective throughout this one.  In short good game, okay graphics in comparison to CS and all in all a base game which is expected to be on any steam account :)
The best online cross-platform action game you can buy!
The best, most balanced, and fun team based FPS around. It is incredibly difficult trying to find a FPS that has as much balance as this game.
